summary: Paranoia forces small-time scam artist Marty to flee his hometown and hide out in a dangerous Detroit. With nothing but a pocket full of bogus checks, his Power Glove, and a bad temper, the horror metal slacker lashes out.
cast: Joshua Burge|Joel Potrykus|Teri Ann Nelson|Jason Roth|Joe Anderson|Alan Longstreet|Scott Baisden|Trpl Blk|Katie Call|Michael Cunningham|Chris Kotcher|Lisa Mueller|Abi Obisesan|Michael Saunders|Crystal Sparks|Camille Vanderweide|Rico Bruce Wade|Chris Wintercorn
title: Buzzard
